title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Man of Letters in the Modern World" by Allen Tate, Meridian Books", 1955
title_raw: Bookjacket for "The Man of Letters in the Modern World" by Allen Tate, Meridian Books
medium: Lithography in orange, grey, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically at upper right in black ink and script: lustig
On the right side of the cover in white: the man/ of/ letters/ ALLEN TATE: Selected essays 1928-1955/ in the/ modern/ world
Across the bottom in white and black: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press/ Sewn-bound for durability M3 $1.35 [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has an orange background. The title is surrounded by patches of black and grey. The title, author's name and publisher are written vertically on the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name, synopsis and review of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Man of Letters in the Modern World" by Allen Tate, Meridian Books", 1955. Lithography in orange, grey, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-183.
